name: Starship Cruiser Defense
description:
Starship Cruiser Defense was developed for the ScoreSpace Jam #1

Starship Cruiser Defense is a 2D tower defense game with endless waves, buy turrets and missiles to defend your ship. Click on enemies to teleport them back to the start!

*Not recommended on Full Screen

Created by:

skarrx24#2015 - Lead Designer and Artist

kene991#2932 - Programmer

jafmitch#6799 - Game Audio (SFX and Music) and programmer

!panther5252#5681 - Artist
